title: Inside Stacey Solomon and Joe Swash's lavish Essex home with giant bean bags and stylish interiors
text:
Get the biggest I'm a Celebrity stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

They have built a lovenest together since moving in last year.

So it's no wonder Stacey Solomon , 30, and her presenter beau Joe Swash , 37, both regularly share glimpses inside their Essex home on Instagram .

The beautiful home is nothing short of cosy as it is well furnished with stylish interiors, lavish decor and all the essential things that make a house a home.

Stacey recently took to Instagram to unveil an early birthday gift to herself as she debuted an amazing autumnal display she had installed around her front door.

(Image: Instagram)

With an extravagant rustic wreath, giant archway and a crate full of pumpkins, we suspect neighbours stopped to admire the stunning sunflowers, leaves and colourful foliage.

She shared the dramatic display with her followers: "Last year was a lonely unicorn pumpkin and our trick or treater number really suffered. Well not this year! I've invested in a little display that I can keep forever and get out every year (obviously not the pumpkins, they'll be soup soon)."

She added: "I'm not sure if this is the result of a mild midlife crisis but I'm going with it. Happy Pumpkin Season everyone!"

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Joe and Stacey, who have been in a serious relationship for three years since meeting on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! in 2010, recently welcomed their first son , Rex, together in June.

As the star gave birth, the couple have continued to flaunt their family life on social media.

Writing in her Fabulous column recently, Stacey revealed what it is really like living with Joe.

(Image: Instagram)

She said: "He has no idea how to do a weekly shop and what to buy, and he spray tans on a regular basis inside the house, leaving a constant green-brown tinge on all of the surfaces."

It is no wonder this gets on the former X Factor star's nerves as the couple's modern kitchen boasts a monochrome colour scheme and has an open plan structure with a pretty skylight and spotlights.

With a striking mosaic tile wall feature and and a huge double fridge-freezer, it is the ideal place for the Loose Women panellist to whip up some delicious family dinners.

(Image: Instagram)

The family’s living room set up is also super cosy. With a huge white media unit for their flat screen television and open shelving with framed photos and ornaments - it is an interior lovers dream.

One snap revealed their plush living room set up and showed Stacey's two sons playing games consoles on additional screens, while their mum relaxd on the luxurious sofa.

Social media photos also show off the home's giant furry bean bags, which appear to have been claimed by Zachary, 11, and Leighton, seven,

(Image: Instagram)

The Essex property also boasts a large garden area where the family enjoyed a summer of fun this year.

The reality star has decorated her garden with glamorous outdoor furniture and a swanky firepit for the couple's romantic evenings once the children are in bed.

Other sneak peeks of Stacey and Joe's humble abode have revealed Leighton's giant shark mouth bed.

(Image: Instagram)

Stacey and Joe's bedroom is also stylishly decorated with a neutral colour palette and a vibrant green leaf duvet with statement yellow cushions.

Stacey and Joe announced their move to their 'together home' last October on the star's birthday with a sweet family snap as Stacey revealed they were ready to " blend their lives together ."

Rex is the latest arrival to the family home and joins Stacey's two sons Zachary and Leighton, as well as Joe's son Harry, 11.
description: Loose Women's Stacey and Joe have given fans an inside look at their family "together home" in Essex
